messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Harpers Ferry
messages.msgSnippet: Here s my two cents worth on visiting Harper s Ferry and Gettysburg the same day, I think you may find it a bit much. From HF to G-burg it is about an hour or
messages.messageBody:
Here's my two cents worth on visiting Harper's Ferry and Gettysburg the same
day, I think you may find it a bit much. From HF to G-burg it is about an hour
or so drive, count it as two hours door to door.
You also mentioned going to Anteitam Battlefield, I would spend a half day at
HF then head to the battlefield in the afternoon. The field is located in a
town called Sharpsburg and they have a FANTASTIC old fashioned Ice Cream shop
there. Perfect for lunch. LOL
Then I'd head up to Gettysburg and get settled for the evening. Gettysburg is
an entire day visit (at least) and starting there in the morning will help. I
would love to do those two days with you, do you have an idea of when you
will be here?

Elissa Jill

Life's challenges are not supposed to paralyze you;
They're supposed to help you discover who you are.
~Bernice Johnson Reagon


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
